title: Problems of housing: the individual home
creator_credit: Harold F. Clark, ERPI Classroom Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: A study of the desirable and necessary aspects of homes: shelter from weather in all seasons, adequate ventilation without drafts, abundant light, protection from insects and aesthetic appeal.
